ref.mixed-citation:
Presnall, D. C. , &
Gasparik, T. ( 1990). Melting of enstatite (MgSiO 3) from 10 to 16.5 GPa and the forsterite (Mg 2SiO 4)–majorite (MgSiO 3) eutectic at 16.5 GPa: Implications for the origin of the mantle . Journal of Geophysical Research, 95( B10), 15,771– 15,777. 10.1029/JB095iB10p15771
